description: React component for an admin inbox page with PDF viewing, document management, and onboarding submissions handling.

classes.name: InlinePdfViewer
classes.description: A React component for viewing PDFs inline with zoom, rotate, download, and print functionalities.

classes.name: OceanTag
classes.description: A small component displaying a tag indicating whether a document is provided or missing.

classes.name: ActionButtons
classes.description: Component rendering view and download buttons for PDF documents.

classes.name: AdminInbox
classes.description: Main React component for the admin inbox page, managing document submissions and PDF viewing.

methods.name: toFileName
methods.description: Generates a safe filename for PDFs based on a prefix and email.

methods.name: handleView
methods.description: Handles opening a PDF or HTML document in the viewer.

methods.name: handleCloseViewer
methods.description: Closes the PDF viewer and clears related state.

methods.name: handleVerify
methods.description: Verifies the PDF decoding process with a sample base64 PDF.
